byline.contributor: Jawad Sukhanyar and Ahmad Shakib contributed reporting.

abstract: Swedish Committee for Afghanistan calls for independent inquiry into raid on Afghan hospital it funds; asserts execution of three people there by Afghan forces, who were accompanied by NATO soldiers,  violates Geneva Convention; episode follows October 2015 destruction of Doctors Without Borders hospital by errant American airstrike.

headline.print_headline: Investigation Into Raid on Hospital Is Sought
headline.main: Swedish Aid Group Seeks Inquiry Into Afghan Hospital Raid

keywords.value: War Crimes, Genocide and Crimes Against Humanity
keywords.name: subject

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
keywords.name: subject

snippet: The Swedish Committee for Afghanistan asked for an independent investigation into the raid in which, it said, three people were killed.
lead_paragraph: The Swedish Committee for Afghanistan asked for an independent investigation into the raid in which, it said, three people were killed.
